ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Sean is admitted into G.I. Joe with the codename 'Throwdown.' Fred 172's loyalty is tested while Firefly and his allies take Fred 191 on a joyride, destroying an armory along the way. Storm Shadow destroys a nest of Blue Ninjas. The Joes argue over the idea of using Serpentor as a weapon. Budo trains Storm Shadow's apprentice Raymond.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:20:40. [Issue ID 1294469]
